1485960.name: Masters of Puzzle - The Halfway Point
1485960.description:
This is the latest wonderful photography by the artist King Wong who named it The Halfway Point. It offers a unique contrast between the evening lighted street, the temple, and the gray sky above.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. Due to the large number of unique details and areas this puzzle should not be too difficult to assemble and is therefore suitable for less-skilled players. Still, the pure beauty of the photography will make the experience worth it. And you could always pick a higher number of puzzle tiles if you need a greater challenge.
1485960.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
